mapper.select: SELECT tb.articleNo, tb.parentNo, fnc.level, tb.title, tb.content, t_imagefile.imageFileName, tb.writeDate, tb.id FROM (SELECT function_hierarchical() AS articleNO, parentNO, @level AS LEVEL, title, content, imageFileName,writeDate, id FROM (SELECT @start_with:=0, @articleNO:=@start_with, @level:=0) tbl JOIN t_board) fnc left outer join t_board tb ON tb.articleNo = fnc.articleNo LEFT OUTER JOIN (SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(imageFileName SEPARATOR ', ') AS imageFileName, articleNO FROM t_imagefile GROUP BY articleNO)t_imagefile ON t_imagefile.articleNO = fnc.articleNo ;
mapper.insert: INSERT into t_board(articleNO, title, content, id , imageFileName) VALUES(#{articleNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, null)
INSERT into t_board(articleNO,parentNO, title, content, id , imageFileName) VALUES(#{articleNO},#{parentNO}, #{title}, #{content}, #{id}, null)

INSERT INTO t_imageFile(imageFileNO, imageFileName, articleNO) VALUES
(#{item.imageFileNO}, #{item.imageFileName}, #{item.articleNO})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_board WHERE articleNO = #{articleNO} OR parentNO = #{articleNO}
